This artbook consists of:
>An additional one-shot story, fully illustrated in comic format.
Silver and her companions go to Scotland this time! Their misadventures continue as they meet Ceasg, a mermaid who grants wishes!
>Unpublished character sketches.
> In-game BGs and CGs, in full HD.
>Additional game assets.
>A complete 40 pages of the game's unique, hand-drawn art.

Instructions:
==========================
Upon purchase, this book will be downloaded to your computer in PDF format. To access your ebook, navigate to the Misadventures of Laura Silver game folder.

* Right click Misadventures of Laura Silver in your Steam Library
* Select Properties
* Go to the Local Files tab
* Click Browse Local Files
==========================
